title: Mutta Kalakki Song Lyrics From Youth

sections.intro: Mutta Kalakki is an electrifying mass anthem from the 2002 cult classic 'Youth' that perfectly captures the rebellious energy of young Tamil cinema. Composed by the legendary GV Prakash Kumar and powerfully rendered by Ken Karunaas, this song became an instant hit with its infectious beats and celebration of youthful rebellion. The track features GVP's signature folk-electronic fusion that would later become his trademark sound.
sections.easterEgg: Hidden gems in Mutta Kalakki: The opening gaana beat was recorded using actual street drums from North Chennai! GV Prakash sampled authentic 'tappu' sounds and fused them with electronic bass. Ken Karunaas recorded his vocals in just one take - his raw energy was so perfect that GVP kept the first recording. The word 'Mutta' (egg) is cleverly used as slang for 'breaking barriers' - a meta-reference to breaking societal norms. Listen closely at 2:15 - you can hear GVP's signature whistle that he would later use in many blockbusters!
sections.faq:
Q: What does 'Mutta Kalakki' mean? A: Literally 'egg-breaking', it's Chennai slang for 'creating chaos' or 'breaking rules' - representing youth rebellion.

Q: Why is this song so popular? A: The raw gaana beats combined with Ken Karunaas' powerful voice created an authentic street anthem that resonated with youth across Tamil Nadu.

Q: What's special about GVP's composition? A: This was one of GVP's early works where he experimented with folk-electronic fusion, mixing traditional Tamil gaana with modern EDM elements.

Q: Is there a dance challenge? A: Yes! The 'Kalakki step' from the movie became viral even before social media era, with youth across colleges mimicking the iconic moves.

[Creating chaos everywhere]


Youth-u youth-u youth-u

[Let's live life joyfully]

College-la mass-u scene-u

[Mass scenes in college]

[Love and queens in every corner]

[We have dreams and goals]

[Can't waste any time]

System-a break pannuvom

[We'll break the system]


Rules-a shake pannuvom

[We'll shake up the rules]


Youth-oda power paathu

[Seeing the power of youth]


World-aye change pannuvom

[We'll change the entire world]

Oorellam oru feeling-u

[The whole town has a feeling]


Nammaloda dealing-u

[It's our way of dealing]


Energy levels peaking-u

[Energy levels are at peak]


Youth anthem speakingu

[This youth anthem speaks for itself]

Mutta kalakki mutta kalakki

[Breaking barriers, creating chaos]


Muttu muttu muttu muttu

[Clash clash clash clash]


Mutta kalakki oorellam

[Creating chaos everywhere]

[It's all about youth power]
